--------------------------------------------------------------------------

A crash landing leaves teen Raige Kitai (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after the cataclysmic events forced humanity to escape. With Cypher seriously injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to ask for help, facing unfamiliar terrain, evolved animal species that now dominate the planet, and a relentless alien creature that escaped during the crash. Father and son must learn to work together and trust each other if they want any chance to return home.
